prompts.value: Perfect! Let's personalize your package... We have packages for three countries here... Albania, Brazil and India, where do you prefer to go?

Brazil... Good choice!! A tropical country in South America, with lots of sun and beautiful beaches, I'm sure you gonna love it! :)

Now we have to choose your airline company, two options are available:
LATAM Airlines - cheaper one, with a stopover in the United States (Miami) - more than 20 hours to arrive (good to save some money and know another place)
AirCanada - a more comfortable option, with a direct flight from Toronto - 10 hours to arrive

Which one is gonna be?

Okay, I saved the info! 

Now it's time to choose your hotel:
We have the luxurious 5-star Copacabana Palace, located in the Copacabana neighbourhood as the name implies and has hosted celebrities such as Mick Jagger, Catherine Zeta-Jones and Madonna. The other 4-star option is Windsor Barra, located in the Barra da Tijuca neighbourhood and has a breathtaking view of the beach.

So, what will it be your lucky place?

Hmm, it will be a nice stay!

Now it's your turn to tell me if you stay at the hotel a lot or prefer to walk around the city to have your meals. 
You can just enjoy breakfast, breakfast and dinner or not enjoy any meal at the hotel... 
What do you think?

Ok! To complete your package, you just need to choose one more item, my favourite: sightseeins! 

In the city of Rio de Janeiro, we have two world-renowned places: Corcovado, also known as the statue of Cristo Redentor, and Pão de Açúcar, a mountain with a spectacular view. 

Want to include 0, 1 or 2 attractions in your trip?

speech:
Ready! This is the summary and the price of your travel package:

Country: $country
Airline: $airline
Hotel: $hotel
Meals included: $meals
Sighseeings included: $sightseeings

Total price: CA$ XXXX.XX
Total price with discount: CA$ XXXX.XX

Do you want to change something?
